WEATHER FORECAST FOR 19 APRIL 2025
Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 18 April 2025

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Sabaragamuwa, Central, Eastern and
Uva province and in Polonnaruwa and Hambantota districts during the afternoon or night. Fairly
heavy falls of above 50 mm are likely at some places in these areas.

S
howers  may  occur  in  Western  province  and  in  Galle,  Matara  and  Puttalam  districts  in  the
morning.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.

M
isty conditions can be expected at some places in Central, Sabaragamuwa and Uva provinces
and in Ampara and Batticaloa districts during the morning.
